item.description: /c/FAWM on lemmy.studio https://lemmy.studio/c/fawm Description [FAWM](https://fawm.org/) is a global music community that meets virtually every February and during northern hemisphere Summer to try to write as many songs as possible. item.title: Grooveboxes, workstations and more!
item.description: /c/Grooveboxes, workstations and more! on lemmy.studio https://lemmy.studio/c/grooveboxes Description If you want to chat about grooveboxes, workstations or other do-it-all music production gear, feel free to chat about it here! Self-promotion is totally okay as long as you aren't just going absolutely crazy with it. :) Details * Subscribers 9 Posts 2 Comments 24 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 6 Monthly Active Users 6 Published 2023-06-13 04:17:48 Updated 2023-06-13 04:23:00 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:01

item.title: Song feedback needed
item.description: /c/Song feedback needed on lemmy.studio https://lemmy.studio/c/feedback Description Are you working on a song or just finished it and want some feedback? Post it here so we can listen and comment on it! A few ground rules: - When asking for feedback, It's generally better to mention what kind of feedback you want. Are you looking for feedback on the mix? The arrangement? Drums? (It's OK to just ask for general feedback, though.

item.title: The Caretaker
item.description: /c/The Caretaker on lemmy.studio https://lemmy.studio/c/thecaretaker Description For discussion of The Caretaker (AKA Leyland Kirby, The Stranger, and V/Vm) and other similar artists. **Rules** 1. Be respectful to everyone here. Obviously this includes basic criteria. Racism/homophobia/tranphobia/other types of bigotry will not be tolerated here, and will be met with an instant ban. In addition to that, we ask you to be respectful to those who are suffering with dementia or those who know someone going through something similar.

item.title: Beach House
item.description: /c/Beach House on lemmy.studio https://lemmy.studio/c/beachhouse Description ## Welcome! c/BeachHouse is the best place in the Fediverse for fans to talk about music, events, news, and anything else Beach House! ## Rules 1. Keep discussions related to Beach House. 2. Be respectful and civil. No hate speech, personal attacks, or trolling. 3. No piracy, illegal downloads, or leaks. 4. Respect people's privacy. No doxxing or sharing private info about the band's personal lives.
